title: "Machine learning sees into the future to prevent sight loss in humans"
excerpt: "Researchers from the Tokyo Medical and Dental University (TMDU) developed machine-learning models to predict visual acuity in patients with high myopia. A cohort study of 967 patients was used to evaluate the models."
